text: Unplugged is the debut EP by Australian rock band 5 Seconds of Summer. The EP was released on June 12, 2012 through Capitol Records. The EP featured two studio tracks, one studio cover and one live cover. The EP was also recorded acoustic and the members were sick while recording which resulted in a sickly sounding vocals. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Andrew Edgson *Ashton Irwin – recording engineer (track 4), producer (track 4), vocals (all tracks) *Calum Hood – recording engineer (track 4), producer (track 4), vocals (all tracks) *Michael Clifford – recording engineer (track 4), producer (track 4), vocals (all tracks) *Luke Hemmings – recording engineer (track 4), producer (track 4), vocals (all tracks) *Andrew Edgson – mastering engineer ==References== Category:2012 debut EPs Category:5 Seconds of Summer albums
title: Unplugged (5 Seconds of Summer EP)
